page.title: 09A local family's typical day
page.content: {6.30a.m.}Teasmade wakes Mum and Dad {6.35a.m.}They wake family.Breakfast. Sandwich lunches packed. 7.00a.m.Dad feeds and waters chickens. 7.20a.m.First daughter to'bus stop.She delivers milk on the way. 7.30a.m.Mum feeds and milks the goats. 8.00a.m.Dad goes to work.Mum finishes milking,strains and cools milk 8.45a.m.Mum takes 2nd daughter to school.Visits a playgroup. 12 noon Mum returns home.Checks animals.Has lunch.Housework. 3.30p.m.Mum collects 2nd daughter from school.Chickens fed.Collects eggs.Deliver to local customer 4.50p.m.Ist daughter home.Homework begun. 5.30p.m.Dad home.Evening meal for all. 7.30p.m.Mum does evening milking. 8.30p.m.Girls to bed.Chickens shut in 10.30 p.m.Mum and Dad to bed to read.
